mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game(game_date,game_time,game_addr, game_flag, club_no, club_ability) VALUES ( #{game_date}, #{game_time}, #{game_addr}, #{game_flag}, #{club_no}, #{club_ability});
mapper.select: select * from game inner join club on game.club_no=club.club_no where game_no > 0 order by game_no desc;
